mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE_PK , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PW , A.PW_IS_TEMP , A.PW_CHANGED_DATE , A.PW_EXPIRATION_DATE , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.SIGNUP_DATE , A.EXPIRATION_DATE , A.IS_EXPIRATION , A.WITHDRAWAL_DATE , A.IS_WITHDRAWAL , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.IS_ENT_MEMBER , B.MEMBER_NO_PK_FK , B.AUTHORITY_CODE_PK_FK , C.AUTHORITY_CODE , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM TBL_MB_MEMBER A JOIN TBL_MB_MEMBER_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_CODE_PK = B.MEMBER_NO_PK_FK) JOIN TBL_MB_AUTHORITY C on B.AUTHORITY_CODE_PK_FK = C.AUTHORITY_CODE WHERE A.IS_WITHDRAWAL = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE_PK , A.MEMBER_ID , A.EMAIL , A.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_MB_MEMBER A WHERE A.IS_WITHDRAWAL = 'N' AND A.EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO TBL_MB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_CODE_PK, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW , PW_CHANGED_DATE, PW_EXPIRATION_DATE, MEMBER_NAME , SIGNUP_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_DATE , PHONE, EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_MB_MEMBER_CODE_PK.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberPw} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE + 365, #{memberName} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE, NULL , #{phone}, #{email} ) INTO TBL_MB_MEMBER_ROLE (MEMBER_NO_PK_FK, AUTHORITY_CODE_PK_FK) VALUES (SEQ_MB_MEMBER_CODE_PK.currval,2) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO TBL_MB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_CODE_PK, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW , PW_CHANGED_DATE, PW_EXPIRATION_DATE, MEMBER_NAME , SIGNUP_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_DATE , PHONE, EMAIL, IS_ENT_MEMBER ) VALUES ( ${memberCodePk}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE + 365, #{memberName} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE, NULL , #{phone}, #{email}, 'Y' ) INTO TBL_MB_MEMBER_ROLE (MEMBER_NO_PK_FK, AUTHORITY_CODE_PK_FK) VALUES (SEQ_MB_MEMBER_CODE_PK.currval,3) INTO TBL_MB_ENT_MEBER (REMAINING_POST, REMAINING_INQUIRE, COMPANY_CODE_FK, MEMBER_CODE_FK) VALUES (0, 0, null, SEQ_MB_MEMBER_CODE_PK.currval) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MB_MEMBER A SET A.IS_WITHDRAWAL = 'Y' , A.WITHDRAWAL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE A.IS_WITHDRAWAL = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_CODE_PK = #{memberCodePk}
mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE_FK , A.COMPANY_CODE_FK , A.REMAINING_POST , A.REMAINING_INQUIRE , A.IS_ACTIVE FROM TBL_MB_ENT_MEBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE_FK = #{memberCodePk}

SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE_PK , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.SIGNUP_DATE , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , B.MEMBER_CODE_FK , B.REMAINING_POST , B.REMAINING_INQUIRE , B.IS_ACTIVE , C.COMPANY_CODE_PK , C.COM_URL , C.COM_NAME , C.REGIST_NUMBER , C.IS_REVEALED , C.IS_APPROVED FROM TBL_MB_MEMBER A JOIN TBL_MB_ENT_MEBER B ON (A.MEMBER_CODE_PK = B.MEMBER_CODE_FK) JOIN TBL_COM_COMPANY C ON (B.COMPANY_CODE_FK = C.COMPANY_CODE_PK) AND A.IS_ENT_MEMBER = 'Y' AND B.IS_ACTIVE = 'N' AND A.IS_WITHDRAWAL = 'N'

SELECT A.MEMBER_CODE_PK , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.SIGNUP_DATE , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , B.MEMBER_CODE_FK , B.REMAINING_POST , B.REMAINING_INQUIRE , B.IS_ACTIVE , C.COMPANY_CODE_PK , C.COM_URL , C.COM_NAME , C.REGIST_NUMBER , C.IS_REVEALED , C.IS_APPROVED FROM TBL_MB_MEMBER A JOIN TBL_MB_ENT_MEBER B ON (A.MEMBER_CODE_PK = B.MEMBER_CODE_FK) JOIN TBL_COM_COMPANY C ON (B.COMPANY_CODE_FK = C.COMPANY_CODE_PK) AND A.IS_ENT_MEMBER = 'Y' AND B.IS_ACTIVE = 'N' AND A.IS_WITHDRAWAL = 'N' WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE_PK = #{memberCodePk}
